response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to quality. We are offering this masterpiece to you at an exclusive price of $995,000. This is a unique opportunity to own a piece that could potentially appreciate in value over time, making it a wise investment. We believe in creating lasting relationships and are confident that this product will not only meet but surpass your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession.", "product_price": 995000}
